import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Author } from 'src/app/Models/Author' import { AuthorService } from '../Services/AuthorService'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authors', templateUrl: './authors.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authors.component.css'] }) export class AuthorsComponent { authors: Array = [] constructor(private http: HttpClient, private authorService: AuthorService) { } ngOnInit() { this.authorService.getAuthors().subscribe(authors => { this.authors = authors; console.log(this.authors); }); } }
